remarks: Distributive law for inner product subtraction.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ipsubdir.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ipsubdir.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
ipsubdir.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
dipsubdir $p |- ( ( U e. CPreHilOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A M B ) P C ) = ( ( A P C ) - ( B P C ) ) ) $.
